Considering the present state of Indian economy, outline five key agendas for the newly formed Central Government.

 Indian Economy for the newly formed central government

        Prime minister for newly formed central government is Narendra Modi. Firstly we will discuss about the successful journey of Narendra modi. Gujarat was an dry state where 62% of land was covered with desert and due to this  no proper agriculture lands, water facilities was developed but from past 10 years face of Gujarat has changed. It should in first place for exporting vegetables, tourism, industrial belt and 24/7 electricity. This is all because of Narendra modi. he doesn't neglected any one sector and concentrated in particular sector. 

Consider an example of 1990's when Indian was in horrible  situation that their was no currency for running the nation      even for one day. In this situation prime minister P.v Narishma Rao was taken an wise decision and borrowed money from different foreign banks with an agreement made to them. capital which was brought from banks was distributed to different sector people with low interest and paying back the money within certain period of time. This helped the different sectors to run in successful and in turn helped the country for withstand economically.

Now, In Past situation Indian economy rupee  value was declining day-by-day where the present government failed in taking necessary steps. But when Narendra Modi was elected has prime minister initial day itself the stock exchange  rates was increased and  there was change in bullion market the price of gold was increased without reaching to  common man but now it was coming done with removal of tax about 5%.

   Imports and exports tax rates should be decreased for large amount of transactions. Educational system and unemployment should be stabilzed has in the foreign country their should not be private schools for children only government school should  school setup  with good standards and children after completion of intermediate for further studies should be earned by them. so, that employment rate can be increased. scams of many privates schools can be abolished.

Acts for women welfare should be created for freedom of girls and women's in the society. This helps to build the trust among the people towards the government with in turns projects the positive impact towards foreign counties for investing  capital/ visiting India. this for build or provide some foundation for Indian economy .

Entering of FDP into the country this shows both the positive and as well as negative impact. Positive impacts shows the investing of huge capitals and providing employment to the Indian citizens but it shows great effect on small and medium scale business.

 All these  agendas should be consider for building a good nation is not all about single person it it is responsibility of each and every citizen. when every one think this is our nation and starve for it automatically it develops in all aspects.
